channel.title: gradients on Tyler Harms
channel.description: Recent content in gradients on Tyler Harms

item.title: Gradient App
item.description: I am well overdue for a new HarmsSite post. So today I am going to talk about one of my favorite new tools. But first, an intro. Building out gradients is easy enough, get your start color and your end color and then plug them into all the various browser specific gradient css elements (webkit, moz, etc…) and you get a gradient. Like I said, simple enough but time consuming because each browser gets its own line.
